recap_documents.description: ORDER DENYING PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS; DENYING CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY.  After a careful review of the record and pertinent law, the Court concludes that the Petition for a Writ of Habeas Corpus must be DENIED.Further, a Certificate o f Appealability is DENIED. The clerk shall terminate any pending motions as moot, enter judgment in favor of Respondent and close the file.  Signed by Judge Edward J. Davila on 5/14/2012.
